sentences.sContent: Muskrat Castle, as the house had Been facetiously named By some waggish officer.
sentences.sContent_eng: Muskrat Castle, as the house had Been facetiously named By some waggish officer.
sentences.sCn: 麝鼠城堡作为房屋的名称，是由某些诙谐的官员起的滑稽名称。

sentences.sContent: It has the waggish adorableness and the tripping-and-falling roughhouse of other animated films, but it’s also a work of tragic nostalgia.
sentences.sContent_eng: It has the waggish adorableness and the tripping-and-falling roughhouse of other animated films, but it’s also a work of tragic nostalgia.
sentences.sCn: 这部电影不但像其他动画作品一样有着滑稽可爱的动画角色,和跌宕起伏的嬉闹场面,同时,它也不失为一部充满悲剧色彩得感伤作品。

trans.tranCn: 爱开玩笑的, 滑稽的
trans.tranOther: a waggish person makes clever and amusing jokes, remarks etc
